TopicTitle: Stuck on one specific loading screen before launching

Articles.Content: I have been getting stuck on the loading screen with the rocket on a launchpad during sunset. Kinda annoying
Does this happen when you launch a rocket from the VAB? Just sits there and doesn't do anything until you forcibly quit?

20 hours ago, ArtexCosmonaut said:

Does this happen when you launch a rocket from the VAB? Just sits there and doesn't do anything until you forcibly quit?

Yes! It's exactly the same for me too. It's been more the 10minutes now. Samma like nothing is happening

Same here. It happens with both aircraft and rockets. It makes the menu noise if I press Esc but nothing else happens...just sits there and plays dramatic music.

The game is unplayable now. Disappointing.
